item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @zozox zozox
item.description:
@zozox wrote:

hey, i figured it all out myself, so this could probably be deleted now, if anyones curious this is what works

http://www.addictinggames.com/itsafact.html

[code]program New;

var
x, y: Integer;

begin
repeat
if(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 13421772, 30, 450, 600, 600, 15))then
begin
MoveMouse(x, y);
Wait (20);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
end;
until(false)

end.[/code]

Read full topic
